akn:content.akn:p: § 913. Facility exercise requirements The Secretary of the Department in which the Coast Guard is operating shall require each high risk facility to conduct live or full-scale exercises described in section 105.220(c) of title 33, Code of Federal Regulations, not less frequently than once every 2 years, in accordance with the facility security plan required under section 70103(c) of title 46. (Pub. L. 109–347, title I, § 115, Oct. 13, 2006, 120 Stat. 1897.)
